welcome.title: Welcome to Deep Dive!
welcome.description: Explore our high quality scuba gear collection!

descriptions.maskSnorkel: High-quality mask and snorkel set for clear underwater vision.
descriptions.fullBodyWetsuit: Durable and flexible wetsuit providing full-body protection.
descriptions.divingFins: Ergonomic diving fins for efficient movement in the water.
descriptions.diveComputer: Advanced dive computer to track depth, time, and decompression.
descriptions.oxygenTank: Reliable oxygen tank for extended underwater exploration.
descriptions.shortyWetsuit: Short-sleeve wetsuit offering comfort and flexibility.
descriptions.divingBoots: Neoprene diving boots for warmth and protection.
descriptions.bcd: Essential buoyancy control device for safe diving.
descriptions.gearBag: Spacious gear bag to store and transport diving equipment.
descriptions.underwaterCamera: High-resolution underwater camera to capture marine life.
descriptions.divingTorch: Powerful diving torch for visibility in dark waters.
descriptions.regulatorSet: Complete regulator set for safe and controlled breathing.

about.title: About Deep Dive
about.description: Deep Dive is a scuba diving gear web shop built to showcase automated UI testing and localization support. The project is built with React, React Router, i18next (for localization) and Vite, and includes a shopping cart system, a checkout process, and user authentication. While not intended for real transactions, it serves as a portfolio project to demonstrate skills in test automation, frontend development, and localization testing.
